commit message: Synchronized methods to prevent background crashes.

Removed reading pointer.

This never really worked as well as it should, and it didn't really add
much. So, taking it out.
Experimental branch to activate TTS by shaking the phone.
Disabled page number display in scrolling mode.
Fixed bug in which menu item was shown.
Made unsubscribe from media buttons conditional.
Ignores media key events if music if playing and tts is not running.
Updated translations with marked blocks of untranslated text.
Fixed images appearing as grey squares after navigation.
Now checks if TTS folder could be created.
No longer pops up the first item in portrait
Added large display of TTS text.
Moved a lot of text-related stuff into TextLoader.
Make sure cached text is deleted.
Fixed backgroundcolour in day-mode on Android 2.x
Refactored task scheduling into its own package.
Split tasks and allowed for canceling.
Implemented progress bar in list on load.
Added error message to TTS failure.
Added 'open file' option to the library.
Small changes, problem not fixed yet.
Slightly smarter chapter continuation for TTS.
No longer handling key dispatches fixes search.
Now immediately pops up search results when repeating a query.
Added extra message when search yields no results.

Added UTF-8 encoding property to POM.

This is more important now that some source files contain unicode
strings.
Made TTS text display better readable.
Added missing string to German translation.
Organized imports and added missing GPL headers.
